title: Taekwondo
description: I have been practicing Taekwondo since I was 8 years old. I have won several competitions and have a black belt in this martial art.
accomplishments: Learned new techniques and improved my skills
Gained confidence and discipline through training
Have a Green Stripe Belt in Taekwondo

title: Swimming
description: I have been swimming since I was 10 years old. I have joined school competitions and have a silver medal in this sport.
accomplishments: Learned new strokes and improved my speed
Gained endurance and strength through training
Have a Silver Medal in 50m Butterfly

title: Archery
description: I have been practicing archery since I was 12 years old. I have joined school competitions and have a bronze medal in this sport.
accomplishments: Learned new techniques and improved my accuracy
Gained strength and endurance through training
Have a Bronze Medal in Recurve Archery
